rooms.description: Spacious living and dining area with Mediterranean influences including exposed brickwork and arches.
Open kitchen concept integrated into the living area with ample natural light via large windows.
Guest bedroom designed for occasional use with Mediterranean decor and built-in closets.
Modern bathroom attached to the guest room.

common_features.description: Open courtyard with landscaping, natural light and ventilation enhancing the Mediterranean design.
In-ground swimming pool situated adjacent to the courtyard for recreational use.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with en-suite bathroom and built-in wardrobes emphasizing natural light through large windows.
Additional bedroom designed for children or second occupancy with adequate space and natural ventilation.
Shared bathroom on the first floor complementing the bedrooms.

common_features.description: Expansive rooftop terrace designed with a Mediterranean aesthetic, offering panoramic views and natural ventilation.
